name: image-watermarker
title: Image Watermarker
description: Add text watermarks to images with transparency
content:
Overview

This application adds text watermarks to images. Built using Pillow with ImageDraw, it places a semi-transparent watermark at the bottom-right corner.

Features

  • Adds '© WATERMARK' text to images
  • Semi-transparent white text for visibility
  • Positioned at bottom-right corner
  • Font size scales with image dimensions

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a watermarked image with the suffix _watermarked in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Protecting image copyright
  • Branding photos before sharing
  • Adding ownership information
  • Preventing unauthorized use
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_watermarker.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
